original_text: The Lord said, ‘I sent my prophets to warn you of danger. They said, “Listen for the noise of the trumpet! That will tell you when danger is near.” But you said, “We do not want to listen.” The Lord said, ‘I sent my prophets to warn you of danger. They said, “Listen for the noise of the trumpet! That will tell you when danger is near.” But you said, “We do not want to listen.” The Lord said,
korean_text: 내가 또 너희 위에 파수꾼을 세웠으니 나팔 소리를 들으라 하나 그들의 대답이 우리는 듣지 않겠노라 하였도다

sentences.original_text: I sent my prophets to warn you of danger
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 위험을 경고하기 위해 선지자들을 보냈다

sentences.original_text: Listen for the noise of the trumpet
That will tell you when danger is near
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 위험이 가까왔을 때 알려줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: We do not want to listen
